Blog.post: i talked to megan about the stuff and she just explained everything....it was amazing....i read wut she had to say and i was like whoa.......i feel so much better now....there's no tension....but i really dont feel good right now so i'm gonna goto sleep......good night erboeh.....

see i wanna talk to megan and harrison about this crap but i just dont have the courage....i think maybe i'm afraid of gettin in some big even more depressing discussion and i'll end up losing them both....things are already tough as hell on megan...and harrison is just so happy that he gets to hug on megan and be with megan.....i think back to that night when JT confronted me and megan said she couldn't be in a relationship.....i remember saying something like "well i guess this means we cant hold hands anymore..........but can i atleast still hug you?" and megans answer to that question was not no...but yes.......i dont think we ever did hold hands after that...infact i think we got even closer after that.....sure megan i did want to continue becuz i was crazy about you but you didn't really put up a fight.....well i was just IMed by harrison......i told about the blog....this post is the only thing standing in my way from something ...not sure wut that something is though...meh...i can see it now....everything is gonna end...everybody is gonna hate me......*sigh* i dont want to type anymore.....i'm just gonna publish this damn thing and get it over with.....

AAAAAARRRRRGGGGGGG!!! ;_; for some odd reason i feel really sad right now...i'm not sure why...i just dont want to think anymore....my friend crystal has told me to just forget about megan...but its so hard....when i've been focusing on her and only her for such a long time.....i read harrisons journal thingy and he says its like megan was just waiting for him......WUT THE?! wut the hell am i man?!? just a friggin pawn in yalls little chess game of love from hell (wut a name huh? but its not important x_x)....i've known harrison for a long long time and he's a good guy but to me he seems to be acting like a real bastard and that doesn't make me feel good at all.....i dont want to lose megan or harrison as friends but wut other choice do i got?....i just dont know.....i could try to stay friends with them and be miserable cuz i'm too much of an idiot and an asshole to talk to them about it.....or i could make new friends and hang out with different ppl...that way they wouldn't be on my mind as much.....thomas says i should talk to megan and harrison but crystal says i should just let it go...and i want to talk to shara about it cuz she is a very very wise person and i feel i can talk to her about it.......DAMN!! why wont everything just leave me alone?!?.....i feel so bad......wut did i do to deserve this?? AM I SUPPOSED TO GET USED TO THIS?!?!?!? i suppose i sound like a complete bastard..only thinkin of myself.....but then again i dont know....maybe i'm not being selfish.....harrison has said in his journal that he repects ppl blah blah blah.......if only he knew....during the summer i considered harrison my best friend.....it reminds me of that song where the dude is like "shes my best friends girl and she used to be mine".....wut kind of a friend goes out with his buddy's ex?!? even my guitar teacher had some comments...he was like "hmm well who's your real friend?"....something for me to think about....now i'm thinkin about the thing "wuts harrison got that i dont got???".....well i'm not smart like harrison is.....i really have difficulties putting my emotions into words...but just becuz i have a hard time puttings my emotions into words doesn't mean i dont have emotions.....i think of myself as a really sensitive person....harrison and megan are having some tough stuff with religion....so am i....i believe that there is a god...i would love to say that i have faith like harrison does....but it brings tears to my eyes becuz i cant say that i can....its such a horrible feeling.....my mom is a strong Christian.....as for my dad well he doesn't goto church...i dont know his views on the subject and it makes me feel horrible....and this blog makes me think that all i care about is me, me, me, and me......but thats wrong.....i care for all of my friends.....i dont like to hurt anybody unless they hurt me...and usually i never get payback.......and now i'm just beatin myself up..but i cant help it.....its just so hard....i dont think anybody knows wut i feel like...but that cant be true becuz somebody has to...thats just how it is.....and i dont want to end up like megan with (yes i am quoting this from harrison) "excess emotional baggage" but i just dont know how things are gonna turn out......i dont wanna think anymore....i just dont know......i feel pain and anger...i feel like i'm not good enough...i feel like everybody is gonna end up hating me in the end...i just feel a whole bunch of things...and i dont like it.....i dont like how harrison says "it's MEGAAAAN!!!" over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over.....i dont like it....ever since they've been together harrison just seems so full of himself....WELL LET ME TELL YOU....i think megan is gonna leave him out in the cold someday....and i dont think megan is gonna convert into a Christian.......HARRISON! MEGAN! IF YOU TWO ARE READING THIS THEN BLEH!!! if yall are reading this then i would imagine that megan hates my guts now...and i would imagine that harrison isn't too pleased.....i'm gonna stop here...i'll probably think of some more shizz later that i would want to add to this post but it would be a waste of time....um yeah....

hmm alrighty then.....this be meh blog thingy.......at first i was just gonna make it so i could show everyone how pissed off i am but i decided that i can put wutever i want here.....wutever i feel like saying.....my feelings.....my actions....goodies of all kinds....you maybe wondering why i am pissed......well i guess i'll tell ya.....i'm pissed of at harrison and megan......seems to me like they both stabbed me in the back......harrison supported megan and i....then he stabbed me in the back..cuz he wants her now....but he said he didn't want her becuz of religious stuff....nah..that aint how it looks to me.....and then there's megan....i really do think she was leading me on for some time...but she denies it...saying that i was the one that wanted to continue....i did want to continue but if she didn't want to continue then i think she should have done a little bit more to try to shake me off.....i think i've got a few questions for her...why didn't you tell me that you wanted to be with harrison? when did you decide that you wanted to be with harrison?......maybe some more...i'll be thinkin about it....i know that you said that it's not about who is better but sometimes i wonder..wut's harrison got that i dont?!?....i dunno.....i'm not depressed about it anymore...just angry.....i can imagine that there are a few things that i'm overlooking but i'm pretty sure that i have put a lot of thought into this stuff.........heh i bet if yall are readin this yall are prolly thinkin somethin like "WHOA! wut an asshole!!" well if thats wut i am then thats wut i am..........y'know normally i dont like to make ppl uncomfortable if i have anything to do about it......but lemme tell ya.....somehow it feels so good to be really really angry after a long time of just not being very mad......i dont want megan as more than a friend anymore....she can have harrison i suppose.....i dont want to lose anybody as a friend..but if they read this i dont know how they is gonna take it......heh even my guitar teacher has given me wise words about this stuff.....heh heh i think this make it sound like i'm weird but i read harrison and megans "online journal" thingies......i read harrisons and i sense fault....familiar feelings too.......i read megans and from the sound of it it seems like megan to me.....she has really strong feelings...i mean like...they're deep....i dunno....i'm not smart like harrison is....sometimes i have trouble saying wuts on my mind......but harrison may be wise but i'm wise too....i'm not an idiot....bleh..........school is starting soon.....i know school is evil but i look at it this way...wut would we do without school?....there's gonna be new ppl at school.....its gonna be awesome...i look forward to it actually...heh i know i'm probably gonna change my view on that when school starts though..........well i think i would post more but my head hurts so i'm gonna go lie down......if anybody wants to talk to me about this stuff (i bet if you read it you will want to talk to me...) then just IM me...its all good....my good my good...not my bad....my good....
hmm.....i'm bored....already forgot wut i was gonna post....umm hmm....

well hmm wut is this post about?? well i dont have a whole lot to talk about i suppose.....now that i'm alone again....those feelings are coming back again......those alone feelings......all alone......i suppose i'm getting these feelings kinda early....well whether or not they're early...they're back.....back to get me......i dont like the feelings.....and i think that that is just how its gonna be....cant do a whole lot about it......gotta let things flow.....hmm i dunno....they're just some bad feelings....i'm lonely......but dont fret now....there's gonna be new ppl at school.....hopefully you can find a person there this year......wasn't anybody there during 9th grade......i feel not cool....but i'm gettin all lonely again.....i dont like being lonely......ramble ramble ramble......well harrison, megan, and me are friends with each other again....everything is good.....i hope.....i just wanna be friends with them......hmm well....anyways i'm just lonely again....and it doesn't feel good.....i guess its not supposed to feel good......i suppose to some this post here is stupid..or maybe crossing some sort of line or something i dunno...i'm just tellin yall wut i'm feeling..you dont hafta listen to me..but its here so bleh.......well i'm gonna stop and goto sleep......good night......

umm hmm....uhh alright....i recieved another severe dressing down today....made me realize some stuff...well i think it did......i suppose all of this stuff is my fault......it is my fault.....i carried it a bit too far.....i shouldn'ta done that.....hmm.....i dont have a whole lot to say really....well umm sorry....i'm asking megan for forgiveness......megan will forgive me??? i just wanna be friends......i just want all of this to stop now......i guess if you dont feel like forgiving me then you probably wont......i dont have the courage to talk to you about this directly......i'm such a coward.....i cant think of a whole lot to say....i wanna clean up my act....gonna stop cussin again....gonna talk to harrison about my faith.......gotta be more friendly around my folks....this is gonna be hard but its wut i gotta do...atleast thats how i see it now......megan prolly hates my guts now....harrison says he still wants to be friends...thats cool.......i just wanna pick up my guitar and play....it disgusts me to play it though.....both guitars.....they need restringing and i'm not good at stringing guitars unfortunately.....i can play em.....just cant restring em.......all this stuff.....wish i could just do wuts right....but i dont exactly wuts right....i've never been though stuff like this....guess its just stuff i'm supposed to figure out on my own.....i guess thats wut i'm gonna hafta do.......umm i'm gonna stop my post......

hmm today was a really boring day....had to goto the dentist and of course that sucked.....me and kevin was tryin to find somethin to do all day but nothin happened......so i just stayed home and added a couple more numbers to meh long distance number list...did i tell ya about meh list? no....well it be a list of long distance phone numbers of course.....not sure why i got the list....i think i'm just tryin to prove a point or somethin....dont know wut that point is but its all good....well i dont gots anything more to write right now so myeh......

alrighty lets see here.....i am trying my best to be over megan....i just wanna be friends now....heh but there ish no fun in just sittin there doin nothin with megan and harrison sittin over there gettin all friendly so i gotsta bring meh home boys to chill....gonna start doin almost everything atleast with harrison, megan, thomas, kevin, steven, or shara.....nothin offensive by it....just if i'm gonna go somewhurrs to have fun i wanna have fun..... _> >_< shwingity shwigg.....i dont have anythin else to say......

well teh pimpking is back.....MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA I GOT MY LEARNER'S PERMIT!! I'M SO HAPPY!!!!!!......and plus i be learnin stairway to heaven so its all good......i'm not quite up to speed on it but if ya give me a bit more practicin on it then i can get it down..down to boogie!......hmm.........better goto sleep soon cuz i gotsta get up early in teh mornin......the other day we all went to java jack's...except for shara......i went across the street to the krogers parking lot and me and thomas was throwin a disk back and forth across the street.....ppl was honkin at us and flippin us off.....somebody flipped me off cuz i was doin a jig on the side of the road and then for some reason megan got mad or somethin and walked off....i dunno why though.....hmm......then me and thomas and kevin were gonna goto sharas house but the others weren't comin so we went back and then kevin had to leave and then me and thomas started walkin to sharas and then megan and harrison drove past us and stopped at a red light and we started runnin after em and asked for a ride to sharas house......so when we got to sharas house meh mommy called meh ceel phone and was like "i'm outside" and i was thinkin "wut the crap? so???" and then i was like "well we're at shara's house" and then blah blah blah she came to get me and thomas and it was gay....but atleast we both got a ride home O_o......well i dont gots anything more to say.....well atleast i dont think so......kristi was tellin me about my cheek.....i dont have any cheeks to pinch....atleast i dont think so....oh well iss all good check ya later.....

well i have had a severe dressing down......umm yes i am gonna get over this.....i'm gonna sit here and practice stairway to heaven.....its not gonna bother me man.....i'm gonna put it behind me......well i'm gonna try......i suppose if i need to talk about somethin...i'll talk to megan and harrison about it.....since all this is about us (megan, harrison, and me) after all.........i think i have made things out of hand.....but maybe not......bleh....hmm....*sigh* i've gotta study for that test......i'm gonna call up crystal....eventually......still gotta call up chuck.....wiki.....i'm off to study i suppose....

well well um hmm....uhh alright.....i'm thinking that harrison and megan should get away from me.....not becuz of how it would make me feel but it would be one less thing for them to worry about....i dont need to make myself a burden to anybody....i dont know why i hurt like this anymore.....i shouldn't be hurting at all anymore....i thought everything was resolved....i thought things were gonna be good again.....but then somehow it just goes bleh....dunno why...but it did.....it just confuses me.....why cant i let it go?!? I DONT KNOW.....i just dont know....i wanna let it go but i get those feelings again.......i think kevin is right......i just need to find some i like.....it would take my mind off of everything and i think it would bring me back to normal....but i'm not gonna let the same thing happen again....i've gotta watch myself....take care of my balls.....i have taken a break from typin this thing and during that break i was thinkin "alrighty wut i gotsta do is just put this stuff behind me.....even if it means i've gotta be a cold-hearted bitch for a while" and i dont think i'm gonna be one but myeh....just gotta put it behind me.....just gotta get over it.....i think it just needs to be BAM! i'm over it.....not a gradual thing....cuz gradual things take it in the tube.....heh heh tube......anus tube......nasty......how did i end up talkin about anus tubes? oh well i think it would be a good idea if i didn't see harrison and megan for a while.....doesn't mean i dont wanna hang out with them anymore (well it kinda does but not for forever....just until i'm feeling better about this or somethin) bleh.....la la la la la la la la......gosh its been such a long time since i've listened to led zeppelin.....its been such a long time since i've really listened to music......everything needs to get better.....i've gotta make things better......gonna meet lots of new ppl at school....gonna be awesome.....EVERYTHING IS GONNA BE GOOD I SAY!!......i cant really think of anything else i wanna say right now O_o bleh....bleh.....BLEH.....um ok i'm done with this post......

damnit wut is wrong with me???.....just when i thought everything was cool again i see harrison and megan smooching at stevens orgy lair.....i'm thinkin maybe it had somethin to do with "its too sudden" but hell if i know........i know wut i saw....and now it feels like they're just torturing me.....my head hurts when i think of this stuff but when i'm thinkin about other stuff it doesn't hurt.....and then harrison is hating on my friend crystal....man come on dude...not everybody is a Christian but a lot of ppl have been though stuff like this......i dunno man....i'm kindin wishin school would just friggin start already..i need to meet some new friggin ppl.....ow my hurts hurts so much.....i dont wanna do anything....i wish everything would leave me alone....i hate it.....i'm startin to hate myself becuz i still take the time to think about other ppl...i dont wanna be the asshole and think about me and me only......i am not right.....i dont feel right.....i have forgotten wut it feels like to feel good.....its been so long....once you sink your teeth in and your really start to like somebody a lot it just hurts like nothing else to have your heart broken.....ITS BROKEN....but i'll live i suppose......i feel so bad i think i wanna be an asshole for a while....i dunno.......it reminds me of that night when i was really rude to megan.....acting like a bastard....i think i could make a good bastard.....maybe not......sometimes i think "come on man dont let negative feelings take over you completely.....there are still good things in this world" yeah well i dont see any damnit.....almost everything reminds me of megan and it hurts to think about megan......i feel like saying the f word and nothing else but i'm not going that far.....i quit that a long time ago......thats like the worst thing you can say man.....but i'm not hear to talk about stuff like that.....i'm hear to tell everybody how bad i feel.....ppl say they care but i'm so confused and i hurt so much.....i imagine this is nothin for some other ppl y'know....i bet there's ppl out there that are so used to this its nothin......and they can just brag up the anus.....WELL SCREW THIS....SCREW IT ALL.....i hurt to much.....life is too short to live like this....nobody is gonna wait for my dumbass to feel better.....everybody is on their own time....not mine.....sometimes i just wanna tell megan and harrison "fine then SCREW BOTH OF YOU" but i cant do that becuz i really care for them and i want them to be happy....but its no fun if they're being happy but they're making me sad in the process......and then megan is like "nobody gives a damn about me" yes everybody cares for you megan....everybody does....especially harrison...and i suppose if you want harrison then fine....its clear that i cant be that way with you.......i dont want you like that anymore anyways....but it still hurts me....and i dont know why....and i wanna cry damnit but i cant......why do i hafta go through this?!? GOD IN HEAVEN WUT DID I DO TO DESERVE ALL THIS??? i guess He's just generous.....he is almighty y'know....i believe in him....i'm just havin troubles.....and now mom is purposely invading my HUGE personal bubble i have here....why cant she fold those friggin clothes somewhere else......i dont like it......i wish there was a way to just instantly make it all better.....but there isn't....and this sux.....she gettin all crazee on my butt becuz i dont drive like she does.....ITS NOT LIKE I GET TO DRIVE EVERYDAY LIKE YOU....even if you dont want to.....oh man my head hurts.....i'm gonna go lie down....

eh..several ppl seem very not happy....but i dont think there's anything i can do for them...humans are humans..and humans will act like humans...humans are very ignorant but that's just how it is....there may be nothing after death and there may be a god.....i believe there is a god...but i also respect the possibility of nothing after death.....if there is a god then i want to be tight with him...and if there isn't a god and theres like nothing but darkness after death then so be it....there's nothing i can do about it....it's beyond my abilities to try to change something like that....but say after death we all go into some sort of funky realm like dealy and we're all spirits or somethin...well if thats how it is then thats how it is....this is a big world and i doubt that i'm the only person that feels like i do.....if somebody goes out of this world as i do i can imagine there will be atleast one other person that goes the same way as me and after all i'll be a ghost..i'll just find em or somethin like that or do wutever it is that ghosts do....but suppose there wasn't a person like me in there....well then i'll probably get lonely and feel bad and stuff...i'm dead though..things would suck already cuz i'm dead...i dont wanna talk about that kinda stuff anymore....humans suck...humans have always sucked...humans will forever suck....finding another human that you can love is extremely hard.....i myself dont know exactly wut love is...i know that there is a feeling that you can get for somebody but is that love? i'm only 15..i dont know everything there is to know......ppl get all angry and stuff becuz ppl dont use the word love correctly by their terms....example: BILLYBOB I LOVE YOU!!!....i'm not gay....i used that as a joke....A JOKE....but love is not a joke....oh well....i dont know any better.....if nobody tells me wut love exactly then how will i know if i'm in love?....i suppose you just know if you're in love...i've had deep feelings for someone before but i dont know if it was love exactly...it felt like it could have been love....maybe it was love....i dont know....know i feel as though i could be saying somethin against myself somehow and i'm not catching it....wutever...dont listen to me then....infact nobody has to read any of this if they dont want to....but this is MY place and i can put wutever i feel in here and i shouldn't hafta feel bad about it....whether i like it or not i bet there will be some negative thoughts and what not against my posts but everything sucks and then you die....i'm gonna stop becuz i feel like stopping here....

mwahahaha i've been sleeping all day....well..ever since i got home...i read teh peeples journals and stuff like i normally do....but this time was different....i'm not sure exactly how to get this out.....umm for the first time i feel positive about harrison and megans relationship...it feels great.....i really hope it lasts...megan seems to really really enjoy harrisons company and what not...and as for harrison...he loves her to death i think...this is awesome...i believe that this was the result of all them thar prayers....this is tits man!!! though i still wanna talk to harrison about my faith a bit....man God bless em both....i hope their relationship lasts a long time...well i've got shome shtuff i need to do so i'm gonna stop meh post...laterzzzzzzz

hi ppls....umm bleh.....well i had a strange dream last night.....plz dont ask me about it...frankly it freaked me out.....more of a nightmare than i dream.....well anyways....i've got some things on my mind that i need to get out.....but i dont wanna post em here.....i told harrison about em but uhh hmm well meh....i've gotta talk to him about my faith..sometime......blah i had a rather out of the usual conversation with my friend lauren the other night as well.....sounds to me like she is goin through somethin similar to somethin i was goin though...maybe still am goin through....i think i'm out of the worst of it.....i'm still not the same person i was but well i suppose it's for the best.....meh....school is gonna start next monday....it's gonna be cool i guess.....if it sucks well then wut can you expect? i mean c'mon....it is school.......i can't do a whole lot about the teachers and staff there.....they may be not cool ppls but they are in charge....meh........everything seems coo with harrison....but megan is still down and what not....eh i guess i can talk about this here if i wanna......umm lets see.....alright then....i feel like i'm starting to be afraid to talk to megan or somethin....like i keep thinkin that she is gonna get offended by something that i have done......like i dont talk to her as much as i used to......i dont know wut to do....myeh well..my head hurts i'm gonna stop here.....

alright folks i have read megans recent posts on her journal and i read the comments she left on my blog and i must say that i am furious...infact furious is just a fraction of the anger i have....i'm not sure where to start...umm alright i'll just go on....ok i do not live according to megans terms...if i say i was heartbroken then i was friggin heartbroken..i dont care if you say i'm wrong becuz i know that you are the person that is wrong....alright maybe i wasn't in love according to megan but i felt somethin i had never felt before so i said it was love and that's all there is to it....ok so i dont know anything about megan BUT she doesn't know anything about me.....maybe i do live in my own little world but since when did megan become so perfect....i admit it..i dont have a problem at all with things going the way i want em..i think everybody is that way....but i dont get anal about things if they arent going exactly the way i plan...i dont like it and i prolly act negative about it though but i see acting negatively about things i dont like as normal.....yes i am immature but for some odd reason i believe that megan is also a lil bit immature.....and i have lots of friends....ppl do wanna be around me and if you dont want to be one of those ppl then thats fine....i'm not perfect and neither are you...if you dont wanna be friends with me anymore megan well guess what...i feel the same way about you......oh yeah...harrison is probably the best friend i've ever had and i hope he'll never get hurt again....i hope megan treats him the best she can becuz i know harrison loves megan....umm i've said wut i feel like saying right now and i doubt i will respond if megan says anything about my post here.....goodbye

umm hmm i havent put anything here in atleast day i think..meh........umm school sux (did you think it was gonna be cool or something?)....hmm it seems like megan and harrison are practically living together now....she has been rather elusive ever since school started...i havent talked to her since sunday.......umm yeah....moving on....i have seen lots of pretty ppl at school....me and dirk was hangin out with this girl from japan....and she's got a creepy friend from russia *shivers*.....i've got lunch with kevin and business computer wutever the class name is with steven, i've got biology with jeff, jimbo, and jeremy, umm i've got recordkeeping with that weird shaune(shawn?) guy that let me use his cell phone once and umm uhh i've got TK in geometry, and umm nobody in EET..wutever that is.....umm well i gotsta go now some bye ppls...

well today is the last day of summer.....the summer was good and yet bad.....i found somebody i really liked and i felt as though i wanted to pretty much spend the rest of my life with them until she broke my heart and went out with my good friend......i made several new friends.....i did all kinds of cool stuff this summer....all in all everything was worth it....even the heartbreak as i am wiser than i was at the beginning of summer....this school year is gonna be teh PIMPHOUSE......megan said that when she gets her license she could come chill out with us during lunch so thats cool....i dunno if i have any classes with any of my friends....maybe...maybe not......heh my sister is gonna start goin to public school this year....if she has any troubles at all i hope she will tell me.....she prolly thinks i hate her....meh i love my sister....i just dont like the way she acts.....she acts all flaky like a lady from First Baptist Church sorry to say....i dunno how to explain it....i just dont like the way she is....hopefully she'll change into somethin somewhat cooler now since she is gonna goto public school and be exposed to real issues......well enough about my sister....there is gonna be new ppl at school....it's gonna be AWESOME.....i'm really lookin forward to it......YES THAT'S RIGHT I'M LOOKING FORWARD TO SCHOOL!!!!!! man i sound like such a l00zar...but i dont care wut you think.....well umm uhh heh i dont have anything else to say...byebye
